yourBackupForTheTrackHasBeenQueuedAndSho:
**Functional Purpose**: Success message after queuing a single track backup
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Manual Sync section (toast notification)
**When Users See This**: Immediately after successfully initiating a backup for a single track
**Technical Context**: Variable `trackSlug` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Your backup for the {{trackSlug}} track has been queued and should be completed within a few minutes."
errorQueuingBackupForTheTrack:
**Functional Purpose**: Error message for a failed single track backup queue
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Manual Sync section (error message from `handleJsonErrorResponse`)
**When Users See This**: If an error occurs when queuing a single track backup
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Error queuing backup for the track."
somethingWentWrongWhileQueuingTheBackupP:
**Functional Purpose**: General error message for single track backup failure
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Manual Sync section (toast notification)
**When Users See This**: If a network or unexpected error occurs while queuing a single track backup
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Something went wrong while queuing the backup. Please try again."
backupATrack:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the single track backup section
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Manual Sync section (secondary heading)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the manual sync options
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Backup a track"
ifYouWantToBackupATrackToGithubYouCanUse:
**Functional Purpose**: Descriptive text for the single track backup functionality
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Manual Sync section (paragraph below heading)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the manual sync options
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "If you want to backup a track to GitHub, you can use this function."
selectTrackToBackup:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the track selection dropdown
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Manual Sync section (label above track select)
**When Users See This**: When the user needs to choose a track to back up
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Select track to backup"
backupTrack:
**Functional Purpose**: Button label to initiate single track backup
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Manual Sync section (button)
**When Users See This**: After selecting a track to back up
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Backup Track"
syncingIsPausedEnableItToBackUpThisTrack:
**Functional Purpose**: Tooltip message when single track backup is disabled due to syncing being paused
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Manual Sync section (tooltip on "Backup Track" button)
**When Users See This**: When hovering over the disabled "Backup Track" button and syncing is paused
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Syncing is paused. Enable it to back up this track."
backupEverything:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the "Backup Everything" section
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Manual Sync section (secondary heading)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the manual sync options
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Backup everything"
ifYouWantToBackupAllYourExercisesAcrossA:
**Functional Purpose**: Descriptive text for the "Backup Everything" functionality
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Manual Sync section (paragraph below heading)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the manual sync options
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "If you want to backup all your exercises across all tracks to GitHub, you can use this function."
backupEverythingLabel:
**Functional Purpose**: Button label to initiate backup of all tracks
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Manual Sync section (button)
**When Users See This**: When the user wants to back up all their tracks
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Backup Everything"
syncingIsPausedEnableItToBackUpEverythin:
**Functional Purpose**: Tooltip message when "Backup Everything" is disabled due to syncing being paused
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Manual Sync section (tooltip on "Backup Everything" button)
**When Users See This**: When hovering over the disabled "Backup Everything" button and syncing is paused
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Syncing is paused. Enable it to back up everything."
yourBackupForAllTracksHasBeenQueuedAndSh:
**Functional Purpose**: Success message after queuing an "everything" backup
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Manual Sync section (toast notification)
**When Users See This**: Immediately after successfully initiating a backup for all tracks
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Your backup for all tracks has been queued and should be completed within a few minutes."
errorQueuingBackupForAllTracks:
**Functional Purpose**: Error message for a failed "everything" backup queue
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Manual Sync section (error message from `handleJsonErrorResponse`)
**When Users See This**: If an error occurs when queuing an "everything" backup
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Error queuing backup for all tracks."
somethingWentWrongWhileQueuingTheBackupF:
**Functional Purpose**: General error message for "everything" backup failure
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Manual Sync section (toast notification)
**When Users See This**: If a network or unexpected error occurs while queuing an "everything" backup
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Something went wrong while queuing the backup for all tracks. Please try again."
